channel.title: Coder here
channel.description:
I can help code your server, but you will need to host. I won't be doing all the coding, so you will do some yourself.
Add me on MSN > reveal_the_hidden@hotmail.com Don't add me just to fix one thing.

item.title: Coder here
item.dc:creator: @c_man123123123 c man123123123
item.description:
@c_man123123123 wrote:

if (misc.random2 (8) = 1) {

dream thats the code for the random drops and here is an ex of how u use it :

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1458) {
if (misc.random2 (8) = 1) {
ItemHandler.addItem(6611, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
if (misc.random2 (8) == 2) {
ItemHandler.addItem(1704, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
if (misc.random2 (8) == 3) {
ItemHandler.addItem(3204, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
if (misc.random2 (8) == 4) {
ItemHandler.addItem(1478, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
if (misc.random2 (8) == 5) {
ItemHandler.addItem(1725, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
if (misc.random2 (8) == 6) {
ItemHandler.addItem(4087, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
if (misc.random2 (8) == 7) {
ItemHandler.addItem(1187, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
if (misc.random2 (8) == 8) {
ItemHandler.addItem(1149, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
